mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T01_GENEALOGY ( FIRST_NAME , ARMS , VIDEO , INFOMATION , BIGINT ) VALUES ( #{fIRSTNAME} , #{aRMS} , #{vIDEO} , #{iNFOMATION} , #{bIGINT} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T01_GENEALOGY SET FIRST_NAME = #{fIRSTNAME} , ARMS = #{aRMS} , VIDEO = #{vIDEO} , INFOMATION = #{iNFOMATION} , BIGINT = #{bIGINT} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "fIRSTNAME" , ARMS AS "aRMS" , VIDEO AS "vIDEO" , INFOMATION AS "iNFOMATION" , BIGINT AS "bIGINT" FROM T01_GENEALOGY WHERE ID = #{iD}
SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "fIRSTNAME" , ARMS AS "aRMS" , VIDEO AS "vIDEO" , INFOMATION AS "iNFOMATION" , BIGINT AS "bIGINT" FROM T01_GENEALOGY WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "fIRSTNAME" , ARMS AS "aRMS" , VIDEO AS "vIDEO" , INFOMATION AS "iNFOMATION" , BIGINT AS "bIGINT" FROM T01_GENEALOGY WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
